remarks: Lemma for properties of a left module.  (Contributed by NM, 8-Dec-2013.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Jun-2014.)
statement:
islmod.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
islmod.a $e |- .+ = ( +g ` W ) $.
islmod.s $e |- .x. = ( .s ` W ) $.
islmod.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
islmod.k $e |- K = ( Base ` F ) $.
islmod.p $e |- .+^ = ( +g ` F ) $.
islmod.t $e |- .X. = ( .r ` F ) $.
islmod.u $e |- .1. = ( 1r ` F ) $.
lmodlema $p |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ ( Q e. K /\ R e. K ) /\ ( X e. V /\ Y e. V ) ) -> ( ( ( R .x. Y ) e. V /\ ( R .x. ( Y .+ X ) ) = ( ( R .x. Y ) .+ ( R .x. X ) ) /\ ( ( Q .+^ R ) .x. Y ) = ( ( Q .x. Y ) .+ ( R .x. Y ) ) ) /\ ( ( ( Q .X. R ) .x. Y ) = ( Q .x. ( R .x. Y ) ) /\ ( .1. .x. Y ) = Y ) ) ) $.
